metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5340 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
Moodle through 2.6.11, 2.7.x before 2.7.11, 2.8.x before 2.8.9, and 2.9.x before 2.9.3 does not consider the moodle/badges:viewbadges capability, which allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive badge information via a request involving (1) badges/overview.php or (2) badges/view.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5340` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.7.11+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.11+dfsg-2').
